content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HPAM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an IT asset lifecycle management automation system that includes several fully integrated modules that work with a shared data warehouse. IIt also has an integrated reporting system and provides web-based access to data. The solution supports time zones, multicurrency, distributed and mobile resources.  HPAM integrates with various data sources, IT monitoring and management tools, as well as enterprise workflow, resource management, and reporting systems.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM, this application is used by EUS as the main tool for asset management.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":367857,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/16e492b7-9f16-4575-a1e1-423987167012/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/16e492b7-9f16-4575-a1e1-423987167012/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"16e492b7-9f16-4575-a1e1-423987167012\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":466,\"height\":559},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
